channel.title: Rune based v3
channel.description:
Rune Java Base Source v3.0b
This source is a great source for people who want a stable server but can also add on. I recommend this for new people but not too new. It is much different to many other sources. The source was based on ReenScape, i give a lot of credits to them for making such a good stasrting source. Okay, lets show a bit of features. I just decided to release a server of mine for once.
I used this source as a practice on farming. Farming is alot harder then you think. The source has a starting farming code but not too good. Needs alot of improvements.
Okay, i have continued this because i was bored and i want to actually get this base better. Take a look at it!
REMEMBER TO COMPILE WITH THE CORRECT COMPILER.
Is this running correctly for you? If not, then see here: If you get any errors, please report them to me via
Email: insidesin@********.net Website: http://********.net/forum/index.php?topic=239
Features:
* Catherby based. [Not seen much.] * New Commands for Owner's special editing use. [:: gfx# | :: object# | :: emote # | :: pickup # | ::train # #] * You work for your money and/or skills. [Greatly Effects economy.] * Fishing [SUCCESFUL.] * Thieving [SUCCESFUL.] * Range [SUCCESFUL.] * Combat [SUCCESFUL.] * Mining [SUCCESFUL.] * Farming [BASIC CODE.] * Fletching [SUCCESFUL.] * Smithing [SUCCESFUL.] * Woodcutting [SUCCESFUL.] * FireMaking [SUCCESFUL.] * Cooking [SUCCESFUL.] * Magic [SUCCESFUL.] * Perfect Banking. * Perfect Picking Up. * ::train XP SKILLID [Perfect, better then ::master.] * Build on this source and create a great server. * A lot of skills, unlike them lame leeched servers which rely on their PvP combat to attract visitors. [Will STAY LIKE THIS.] * No overpowered shops. [More professional economy.] * Very Stable server with small amount of bugs. [Great for loads of Users.] * ::cat command, follows you around. [Credits to ReenScape]
As Requested, YES, i have added Specials.
* Specials have been added, although they need some touchups, they're with their own handler and all. Credits to palidino for base code. I made it into a handler.
Pictures: [img]http://i385.photobucket.com/albums/oo296/coolplet/monta.png[/img]
Download Links:
Main Download Link(s): 1. http://www.********.net/downloads.html 2. http://rapidshare.com/files/131320726/RJB3.0b.zip.html
NO SPECIALS: 3. http://www.********.net/RJB3.0-NS.zip 4. http://rapidshare.com/files/13132110....0-NS.zip.html
Thanks, Inside Sin. Don't flame, it's going to be updated if people like alot.
Virus Scan: Completely Clean - Thanks to pelta // deforced.
Here the vuris scan: [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2r1z32q.png[/img]

item.title: Rune based v3
item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

Looks decent. I might just download it to check it out

OFFTOPIC: new AND improved?

If something is new, it has never been made before.

If something is improved, it means that the previous version of it was outdated and had bugs or defaults, and was then improved.

How can you improve something new???

Read full topic

item.title: Rune based v3
item.dc:creator: @pelta pelta
item.description:
@pelta wrote:

Rune Java Base Source v3.0b

This source is a great source for people who want a stable server but can also add on. I recommend this for new people but not too new. It is much different to many other sources. The source was based on ReenScape, i give a lot of credits to them for making such a good stasrting source. Okay, lets show a bit of features. I just decided to release a server of mine for once.

I used this source as a practice on farming. Farming is alot harder then you think. The source has a starting farming code but not too good. Needs alot of improvements.

Okay, i have continued this because i was bored and i want to actually get this base better. Take a look at it!

REMEMBER TO COMPILE WITH THE CORRECT COMPILER.

Is this running correctly for you? If not, then see here:
If you get any errors, please report them to me via

Email: insidesin@.net
Website: http://.net/forum/index.php?topic=239

Features:

  • Catherby based. [Not seen much.]
  • New Commands for Owner’s special editing use. [:: gfx# | :: object# | :: emote # | :: pickup # | ::train # #]
  • You work for your money and/or skills. [Greatly Effects economy.]
  • Fishing [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Thieving [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Range [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Combat [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Mining [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Farming [BASIC CODE.]
  • Fletching [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Smithing [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Woodcutting [SUCCESFUL.]
  • FireMaking [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Cooking [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Magic [SUCCESFUL.]
  • Perfect Banking.
  • Perfect Picking Up.
  • ::train XP SKILLID [Perfect, better then ::master.]
  • Build on this source and create a great server.
  • A lot of skills, unlike them lame leeched servers which rely on their PvP combat to attract visitors. [Will STAY LIKE THIS.]
  • No overpowered shops. [More professional economy.]
  • Very Stable server with small amount of bugs. [Great for loads of Users.]
  • ::cat command, follows you around. [Credits to ReenScape]

As Requested, YES, i have added Specials.

  • Specials have been added, although they need some touchups, they’re with their own handler and all. Credits to palidino for base code. I made it into a handler.

Pictures:

Download Links:

Main Download Link(s):

  1. http://www.********.net/downloads.html
  2. http://rapidshare.com/files/131320726/RJB3.0b.zip.html

NO SPECIALS:
3. http://www.********.net/RJB3.0-NS.zip
4. http://rapidshare.com/files/13132110…0-NS.zip.html

Thanks, Inside Sin. Don’t flame, it’s going to be updated if people like alot.
